Articles.Content:
Have you gotten tired of supporting your mod? Are you planning on pulling a Macey Dean? Then this is the place for you! Here, you can pass your mod to volunteers! Now your great mod needn't disappear when you lack the energy and grace to put up with the legions of dissapointmed and disgruntled forum goers can attract.

 

VOLUNTEERS:

@Andem - Current mods: Solar Panel Attachment Nodes.

@Leeman - Navball Docking Port Alignment Indicator Patch

 

VOLUNTEERING GUIDELINES:

Just one for right now, if you are working on any mods, say so! That way people can see what you have on your plate.

GUIDELINES FOR PASSING MODS ALONG:

State whether you will not be returning or if you are on temporary hiatus please.

State the wether you are allowing changes to your mod. PLEASE BE SPECIFIC!

Know that once you pass along your mod, the new dev can then pass it on to someone else. Please do not be alarmed if this occurs. 

When passing along your mod, the license you used is MANDATORY. The new dev is only allowed to change if you express explicit permission.

Also, please PM the person who you want to continue your work, I have heard that doing it in public could cause argument, although I don't personally see how.

Before passing along your mod, it might be necessary to change the license temporarily. I'm not saying you have too, just saying it's a possibility.

Edited April 15, 2016 by Andem
You can put me on the list of Volunteers aswell. New to KSP however I love it :3 And got quite some years experience in C#

Nevermind, checked myself.

Edited April 14, 2016 by Andem

Sorry didnÄt realised you posted here. I "picked" up a mod that wasn't working for the 1.1 pre-release anymore and as the author was not on the forums for 3 months.. (No real takeover just a "patch" so to speak)
